solution_line_template: After the first cut, the board was {initial_length} - {first_cut_amount} = <<{initial_length}-{first_cut_amount}={length_after_first_cut}>>{length_after_first_cut} cm
The other boards were {length_after_first_cut} + {cut_off_to_match} = <<{length_after_first_cut}+{cut_off_to_match}={length_before_final_cut}>>{length_before_final_cut} cm before they got cut.
